comments.content: [Horatio](http://web.archive.org/web/20100518194235/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/horatio_light/?sample_text=baristas&sample_size=96) is as close as I can get.

Having serifs on a Bauhaus-style font is unusual, and may be a customization. Stephen's candidate is a good choice.

- Mike Yanega
